page.title: 16Farleigh School, Red Rice
page.content: Farleigh School is a private, Roman Catholic Preparatory School. 130 children between 3 and 13 years of age attend the boarding school (2 girls and 128 boys). There are 14 full-time and several part-time teachers. Other staff includes secretaries, cooks, cleaners, groundsmen and matrons. A school was first established on the site in 1960, prior to this the building was a private house. It stands in large grounds with room for several games' pitches, tennis courts, a swimming pool, gymnasium, gardens and arboretum. The school has its own chapel where assembly is held daily and mass once a week. Games played include: Rugby, Soccer, Cricket, Athletics, Squash, Golf and Tennis. The equipment in the school in- cludes 6 computers in a computer room.
